text: Malacoscylus gratiosus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1881. It is known from Ecuador.BioLib.cz - Malacoscylus gratiosus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1881
title: Malacoscylus gratiosus
